name: Rei Taro

Bringing over 10 years of backend development experience, specializing in financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines, utilizing **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and cloud technologies like **AWS** and **Azure**. Dedicated to enhancing customer relations through meticulous support and technical expertise cultivated at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
